FuncDef: This command configures the renew-timer (T1), the time at which the client contacts the server from which the addresses in the IA_NA or IA_PD were obtained to extend the lifetimes of the addresses or prefixes assigned to the client.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of days of a renew timer. Values-0 to 7.
Specifies the number of hours of a renew timer. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the number of minutes of a renew timer. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the number of seconds of a renew timer. Values-0 to 59.
